text: Miracles for Beginners is the sixth studio album from UK singer-songwriter Nick Harper. ==Track listing== # "Miracles for Beginners" # "Blue Sky Thinking" # "The Field of a Cloth of Gold" # "Magic Feather" # "Evo" # "2 Secs" # "Always" # "Your Love Has Saved Me from Myself" # "Communication" # "Simple" ==References== ==External links== *Official album page Category:2007 albums Category:Nick Harper albums
title: Miracles for Beginners
